CADI.Common.Cache

Class ExplicitBinDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • CADI.Common.Cache.ExplicitBinDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassIdentifiers

    public class ExplicitBinDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassIdentifiers
    This class is used as a container for the explicit-bin-descriptor.

    Information about data-bins can be set using the numberOfBytes or/ and numberOfLayers attributes.

    If both attributes are BinDescriptor.WILDCARD a wildcard is represented, but never can be only one of the attributes.

    Further information, see ISO/IEC 15444-9 sect. C.8.1.2

    Version:
    1.0.2 2012/05/17
    Author:
    Group on Interactive Coding of Images (GICI)
